intrebare?: If you paint a mural on a classroom wall as an assignment for your art class, who owns the copyright?
raspuns1: The school because it owns the wall.
raspuns2: You do because you are the "author" of the work.
raspuns3: Your parents because you are too young to own a copyright.
raspuns4: Your art teacher because she assigned the art project.
raspuns corect: You do because you are the "author" of the work.

intrebare?: Which of the following items can be copyrighted?
Which of these statements is false?
raspuns1: Copyright protection applies worldwide uniformly, with the same rules and duration in every country.
raspuns3: Copyright does not last forever and can expire after a certain time.
raspuns4: Copyright protection requires the author to renew it periodically to maintain their rights.
raspuns corect: Copyright protection requires the author to renew it periodically to maintain their rights.
